summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LuxScaler v27 'Modes & Vision' Logic. All backend API endpoints are working correctly, including user macros, pro macros, vision analysis, and full generation flow. Frontend UI is functional with proper mode selection and dashboard interface.
passed_tests: Login Authentication - User creation and login working
Pillars Config Structure - All pillars present with correct structure
Slider Update - Level mapping and snippet updates working
User Mode Update - PRO mode switching working
User Macro Logic - limpieza_artefactos correctly set to 10 with quality=10
Pro Macro Logic - grano_filmico correctly set to 0 with macro_restoration
Vision Analysis - Real Gemini API working, returns semantic_anchors list
Full Generation Flow - Complete image processing with text output
Frontend Login - Successful authentication and navigation
Mode Selection - Three modes (USER, PRO, PROLUX) properly displayed
Dashboard Navigation - Successful transition to dashboard
Pro Macro UI - All 9 professional recipe buttons visible and accessible
Image Processing Interface - Upload area and analyze/generate button present

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (UI loading, navigation, and core features working)
